name: Travel Purse
description:
A simple, elegant, and feminine wallet that is made for the minimalist. Easily carries everything you need for a travel or day-to-day use.  The magnet closure makes easy and quick access to your belongings. 

• 4 credit card pockets
• 1 hidden pocket behind the cards for misc. carry
• I.D. Pocket
• 1 main pocket for cash and passport with a built-in tab to help secure your items in purse

5" wide x 6" tall (closed) and 13" tall open

100% veg-tanned leather

name: Suspenders - with clips
description:
These new, fashionable, leather suspenders are the perfect fit for any outdoorsman, or the individual that would love to add a little flavor to any wardrobe. Designed with fast and effect nickel plated clips that can attach to the belt loops of any pants. Made 100% veg-tanned leather and nickel plated hardware

name: Suspenders-to be used w/ belt
description:
These rustic, durable suspenders are designed for the hard working and hard playing outdoorsman. These suspenders have keepers secured by a snap for easy on and off. For use with a belt (belt NOT included). They are made with 100% veg-tanned leather and nickel plated hardware.

The front straps are 1 inch wide. The backstrap is 1.5 inches wide, with an interchangeable keeper to accommodate your style of jeans.

To figure out the length you need, put on your jeans and measure the length from the top of the center rear belt-loop, over your right shoulder, to the top of the front belt-loop on the right.  A fabric measuring tape works best. Make sure the tape measure is snug for best fit.

**Every product is hand cut, hand stained and hand stitched. Because of this, each product varies and no two are alike. Please note, leather is a natural product with scratches, markings and the occasional brand. Some items may have these inconsistencies, but these only add to its uniqueness.

description:
